an10.115:1.3: Adhammanca viditva dhammanca, anatthanca viditva atthanca yatha dhammo yatha attho tatha patipajjitabban”ti.
an10.115:1.5: Idam vatvana sugato utthayasana viharam pavisi.
an10.115:2.1: Atha kho tesam bhikkhunam acirapakkantassa bhagavato etadahosi:
an10.115:2.2: “idam kho no, avuso, bhagava sankhittena uddesam uddisitva vittharena attham avibhajitva utthayasana viharam pavittho:
an10.115:2.5: Adhammanca viditva dhammanca, anatthanca viditva atthanca yatha dhammo yatha attho tatha patipajjitabban’ti.
an10.115:2.6: Ko nu kho imassa bhagavata sankhittena uddesassa udditthassa vittharena attham avibhattassa vittharena attham vibhajeyya”ti?
an10.115:3.2: “ayam kho ayasma anando satthu ceva samvannito sambhavito ca vinnunam sabrahmacarinam.
an10.115:3.3: Pahoti cayasma anando imassa bhagavata sankhittena uddesassa udditthassa vittharena attham avibhattassa vittharena attham vibhajitum.
an10.115:3.4: Yannuna mayam yenayasma anando tenupasankameyyama; upasankamitva ayasmantam anandam etamattham patipuccheyyama.
an10.115:3.5: Yatha no ayasma anando byakarissati tatha nam dharessama”ti.
an10.115:4.1: Atha kho te bhikkhu yenayasma anando tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva ayasmata anandena saddhim sammodimsu.
an10.115:4.2: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidimsu. Ekamantam nisinna kho te bhikkhu ayasmantam anandam etadavocum:
an10.115:5.1: “Idam kho no, avuso ananda, bhagava sankhittena uddesam uddisitva vittharena attham avibhajitva utthayasana viharam pavittho:
an10.115:6.1: Tesam no, avuso, amhakam acirapakkantassa bhagavato etadahosi:
an10.115:6.2: ‘idam kho no, avuso, bhagavata sankhittena uddesam uddisitva vittharena attham avibhajitva utthayasana viharam pavittho—
an10.115:6.5: Ko nu kho imassa bhagavata sankhittena uddesassa udditthassa vittharena attham avibhattassa vittharena attham vibhajeyya’ti?
an10.115:7.2: ‘ayam kho ayasma anando satthu ceva samvannito sambhavito ca vinnunam sabrahmacarinam.
an10.115:7.3: Pahoti cayasma anando imassa bhagavata sankhittena uddesassa udditthassa vittharena attham avibhattassa vittharena attham vibhajitum.
an10.115:7.4: Yannuna mayam yenayasma anando tenupasankameyyama; upasankamitva ayasmantam anandam etamattham patipuccheyyama.
an10.115:7.5: Yatha no ayasma anando byakarissati tatha nam dharessama’ti.
an10.115:8.1: “Seyyathapi, avuso, puriso saratthiko saragavesi sarapariyesanam caramano mahato rukkhassa titthato saravato atikkammeva mulam atikkamma khandham sakhapalase saram pariyesitabbam manneyya;
an10.115:8.2: evamsampadamidam ayasmantanam satthari sammukhibhute tam bhagavantam atisitva amhe etamattham patipucchitabbam mannatha.
an10.115:8.3: So havuso, bhagava janam janati passam passati, cakkhubhuto nanabhuto dhammabhuto brahmabhuto vatta pavatta atthassa ninneta amatassa data dhammassami tathagato.
an10.115:8.4: So ceva panetassa kalo ahosi yam tumhe bhagavantamyeva upasankamitva etamattham patipuccheyyatha.
an10.115:8.5: Yatha vo bhagava byakareyya tatha nam dhareyyatha”ti.
an10.115:9.1: “Addhavuso ananda, bhagava janam janati passam passati cakkhubhuto nanabhuto dhammabhuto brahmabhuto vatta pavatta atthassa ninneta amatassa data dhammassami tathagato.
an10.115:9.2: So ceva panetassa kalo ahosi yam mayam bhagavantamyeva upasankamitva etamattham patipuccheyyama,
an10.115:9.3: yatha no bhagava byakareyya tatha nam dhareyyama.
an10.115:9.4: Api cayasma anando satthu ceva samvannito sambhavito ca vinnunam sabrahmacarinam.
an10.115:9.5: Pahoti cayasma anando imassa bhagavata sankhittena uddesassa udditthassa vittharena attham avibhattassa vittharena attham vibhajitum.
an10.115:10.2: “Evamavuso”ti kho te bhikkhu ayasmato anandassa paccassosum.
an10.115:11.1: “Yam kho no, avuso, bhagava sankhittena uddesam uddisitva vittharena attham avibhajitva utthayasana viharam pavittho:
an10.115:11.4: Adhammanca viditva dhammanca, anatthanca viditva atthanca yatha dhammo yatha attho tatha patipajjitabban’ti.
an10.115:12.1: Katamo cavuso, adhammo, katamo ca dhammo, katamo ca anattho, katamo ca attho?
an10.115:13.3: ye ca micchaditthipaccaya aneke papaka akusala dhamma sambhavanti, ayam anattho;
an10.115:13.4: sammaditthipaccaya ca aneke kusala dhamma bhavanaparipurim gacchanti, ayam attho.
an10.115:15.3: ye ca micchavimuttipaccaya aneke papaka akusala dhamma sambhavanti, ayam anattho;
an10.115:15.4: sammavimuttipaccaya ca aneke kusala dhamma bhavanaparipurim gacchanti, ayam attho.
an10.115:16.1: Ayam kho no, avuso, bhagava sankhittena uddesam uddisitva vittharena attham avibhajitva utthayasana viharam pavittho:
an10.115:16.3: tatha patipajjitabban’ti, imassa kho aham, avuso, bhagavata sankhittena uddesassa udditthassa vittharena attham avibhattassa evam vittharena attham ajanami.
an10.115:16.4: Akankhamana ca pana tumhe, avuso, bhagavantamyeva upasankamitva etamattham patipuccheyyatha.
an10.115:16.5: Yatha vo bhagava byakaroti tatha nam dhareyyatha”ti.
an10.115:17.1: “Evamavuso”ti kho te bhikkhu ayasmato anandassa bhasitam abhinanditva anumoditva utthayasana yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidimsu. Ekamantam nisinna kho te bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavocum:
an10.115:18.1: “Yam kho no bhagava sankhittena uddesam uddisitva vittharena attham avibhajitva utthayasana viharam pavittho:
an10.115:19.1: Tesam no, bhante, amhakam acirapakkantassa bhagavato etadahosi:
an10.115:19.2: ‘idam kho no, avuso, bhagava sankhittena uddesam uddisitva vittharena attham avibhajitva utthayasana viharam pavittho—
an10.115:19.5: Ko nu kho imassa bhagavata sankhittena uddesassa udditthassa vittharena attham avibhattassa vittharena attham vibhajeyya’ti?
an10.115:20.2: ‘ayam kho ayasma anando satthu ceva samvannito sambhavito ca vinnunam sabrahmacarinam.
an10.115:20.3: Pahoti cayasma anando imassa bhagavata sankhittena uddesassa udditthassa vittharena attham avibhattassa vittharena attham vibhajitum.
an10.115:20.4: Yannuna mayam yenayasma anando tenupasankameyyama; upasankamitva ayasmantam anandam etamattham patipuccheyyama.
an10.115:20.5: Yatha no ayasma anando byakarissati tatha nam dharessama’ti.
an10.115:21.1: Atha kho mayam, bhante, yenayasma anando tenupasankamimha; upasankamitva ayasmantam anandam etamattham apucchimha.
an10.115:21.2: Tesam no, bhante, ayasmata anandena imehi akarehi imehi padehi imehi byanjanehi attho suvibhatto”ti.
an10.115:22.4: Mancepi tumhe, bhikkhave, upasankamitva etamattham patipuccheyyatha, ahampi cetam evamevam byakareyyam yatha tam anandena byakatam.
an10.115:22.5: Eso ceva tassa attho evanca nam dhareyyatha”ti.
